name: Aquilus  "Arbor"
description:
*** out on Blood Music but also distributed by Avantgarde

Reissue of Aquilus 'arbor' ep, with one bonus song.

name: Kauan 'Pirut' digipack CD
description:
*** out on Blood Music but also distributed by Avantgarde

"Pirut" - The latest masterpiece by Russian/Ukrainian - folk / post-rock / funeral doom - masters.  A 40-minute funeral doom opera, influenced in part by the Chelyabinsk meteor strike, in which the band was involved during the mixing of the album. 

Released in high-quality digipack on rough-coated reverse-board paper with a 6-panel rough-coated fold-out booklet.

name: Nocturnal Depression "L'Isolement" 7" & 7"+CD (no Tshirt)
description:
** IN STOCK AND SHIPPING NOW

same as the bundle offer, but without Tshirt
you can choose one of the 100 copies limited with cd or the simple 7" ep vinyl

name: Grim Funeral "Abdication Under Funeral Dirge" Box CD n/67
description:
Limited edition boxed set, with silkscreen print, 
67 numbered copies only
includes the "Abdication..." album in all its funereal majesty plus grievous surprise

name: T H A C L T H I "...Erat Ante Oculos" Boxed CD set 33 copies
description:
They came "in silence" (as their name means, from the Liber Linteus Zagrabiensis, in Etruscan language) and in a distressing silence they leave us after 53 minutes of hallucinating sonic violence.

Out 13.11.13

Boxed edition with incense and mink's bones
33 numbered copies only

name: Nocturnal Depression "L'Isolement" 7" + CD + T-Shirt bundle
description:
pre-order
tentative release date November 27th

“L’isolement” is NOCTURNAL DEPRESSION new offering: a 7″ep including the tracks “L’Isolement” and “Beskidt og Forlat“

A limited selection of copies of this ep will include a bonus CD featuring the two vinyl songs plus a few cover songs:
Forgotten Tomb medley (Disheartenment/Love’s burial ground) and Nargaroth’ “Seven tears are flowing into the river”

A T-Shirt displaying the ep artwork will be also available in bundle sale with the 7″/CD pack!

name: Arvas "Into the Realm of the Occult" cd
description:
released by partner-label ATMF,also available through us

Arvas from Norway featuring ex-members of early constellations of Gorgoroth, Koldbrann & Ancient bring forth the spontaneity of the early years and the musical skills of the most professional acts.
Band was mainly a one man act since 1993, under the name of Örth, having some different line-up changes, amongst the ones who was involved as session members: Erik Brødreskift (GRIM) from x Immortal & Gorgoroth & Borknagard & Ares from Aeternus, x Gorgoroth and Immortal. March 2013 Arvas joined in on DEICIDE’s east-euro leg of their End Of The World tour..
The second opus of the band’s career is moving from the darkest and most aggressively evocative black metal visions taking the sound to a personal interpretation of the typically Norwegian atmosphere. Including 3 live tracks as bonus.

name: Darkspace "Dark Space -I" digisleeve CD
description:
Finally available again, revised in a few details and format, Darkspace' debut recording from 2002 (what we could even call their first and last demo) and completely re-recorded ten years after!
Featuring songs "Dark -1.-1" and "Dark -1.0", it's now released also in unlimited digisleeve CD after a 500 copies limted edition from 2012 (and a couple of unfortunate reissues that have been deleted because of manufacturing troubles).
Black polycarbonate discs in digisleeve

In stock now, ships immediately

name: Grim Funeral, Thaclthi, Aphonic Threnody: bundle options
description:
Here is a chance to buy 2 or 3 of our newest releases in bundle

Note, they are not bound into any special boxes or anything: this is just a commercial offer to buy 2 or 3 at cheaper price

The offer is for:
GRIM FUNERAL Abdication under funeral dirge CD
THACLTHI ...Erat Ante Oculos CD
APHONIC THRENODY First funeral CD

you can choose & combine them 2 by 2 in the sales options, or take them 3 all!

name: An Autumn For Crippled Children "Try Not to Destroy Everything You Love" DigiCD
description:
released by ATMF, on sale in our store too

The Metal echoes are plunged on a veil of fragile shoegaze tension. We may try to not destroy everything but this bitter drink it poisoning our backbone, like flowing to a melancholic seaside where the cold wind and salty fears carve our body and soul.After years of acclaimed acts AAAFCC are ready to lead the listener to an even more intense trip to the borders of human emotions. This is where the dreams are turned to delicious nightmares.11

name: Mara "The re-awakening" MiniCD
description:
self produced by this newcomer killer swedish band in 28 (!) copies!
get yours before it's too late, it'll become a classic!

name: Converge, Rivers Of Hell by MIDNIGHT ODYSSEY, THE CREVICES BELOW & TEMPESTUOUS FALL
description:
*** released by I, Voidhanger Records
distributed also through our store 

"CONVERGE, RIVERS OF HELL"

AN OBSERVATION ON THE DARK STREAMS OF HADES BY
MIDNIGHT ODYSSEY, THE CREVICES BELOW AND TEMPESTUOUS FALL

THE CREVICES BELOW Charon - Upon the Winds of lamentation
TEMPESTUOUS FALL Pyriphlegethon - In Death’s Gaping Jaws
MIDNIGHT ODYSSEY Lethe - Through the Lair of Hypnos
THE CREVICES BELOW Acheron - Deflecting Heaven’s Will
TEMPESTUOUS FALL Cocytus - Shades of Phantom Souls  MIDNIGHT ODYSSEY Styx - Converge, Rivers of Hell

Total time: 63:52

Jewelcase CD, 24-page full color booklet
Paintings by Erik Heyninck
Art direction and layout by Francesco Gemelli

name: Ævangelist "Nightmare Flesh Offering" 7"
description:
*** released by I, Voidhanger Records
distributed also in our store

Comes in a gatefold sleeve with expanded inside artwork. Black vinyl, strictly limited to 250 copies.

name: Darkspace "Dark Space -I" digisleeve CD x 3 copies
description:
Warning: 3 same copies of the same CD!

This is just a chance/offer for you to buy a 3 copies bundle and it is meant for example for a group of friends who wanna buy 3 and save money, specially on postage!

For description of the product see its proper individual page

name: Inferno "Omniabsence Filled by His Greatness" LP
description:
PLEASE NOTE: RELEASE DATE LAST WEEK OF DECEMBER

We're finally ready to start presales for this one: it was announced but immediately stopped for manufacturing problems.

Those who have preordered this one before 21.11 will shortly be contacted by email for the necessary explanations.

What we have now instead:
- still, gatefold cover on rough paper, 2 vinyl colours option.
- the announced booklet will not be part of the release unfortunately. Lyrics and inside arts will be printed in a more typical insert, 2 sides printed, sheet

The new compendium of morbid Luciferian black metal
a dissonant journey through sinister abyssic atmospheres

Available in solid dark orange or red blood vinyl
Special preorder price: please note after pre-order the unit price will be 16,00 eur

PLEASE NOTE: RELEASE DATE LAST WEEK OF DECEMBER

name: Shining "Förtvivlan, Min Arvedel" CD-Single
description:
Originally Free cover-mounted cd with Sweden Rock Magazine # 83, June 2011

just 3/4 copies left!

name: Inferno "Omniabsence Filled by His Greatness" LP SET: Red+Orange vinyls
description:
This offer is for a bundle set of 2 copies of INFERNO Gatefold LP:

1 in solid orange vinyl
1 in blood red vinyl

this way you will also save 3.00 euro on the total LPs price (normally 13,00 euro per unit) and on postage!

The offer is applied on pre-order time only and will cease after release

PLEASE NOTE: RELEASE DATE LAST WEEK OF DECEMBER

name: The Magik Way "Materia Occulta"
description:
*** released by Sad Sun Music
distributed also through our store

Emerged from a Mortuary Drape's rib, after the album's recording 'Secret Sudaria', THE MAGIK WAY was born in the winter of 1996 by the will of Diabolic Obsession, Old Necromancer and Nequam who, with Azach’s add, created an occult mold body, radically influenced by the study of the esoteric arts and, primarily operates through an idea of the music by the highly theatrical connotations.

name: Progenie Terrestre Pura "U.M.A." digipack CD
description:
Possibly 2013's breakthrough debut album!

q[T]p 'U.M.A.' CD comes in digipack with UV varnish and booklet.
A rather anticipated debut, all reviews received so far speak for themselves!

Few copies left in this format... later on this will be reissued in standard jewelcase

name: T H A C L T H I "...Erat Ante Oculos" CD
description:
OUT NOW

...and then to bones and dust again, resurrecting the sulphureous past of doom/death mammoths like Disembowelment and (early) Unholy, with a weird experimental and ritualistic revision born from the wounds of their sinister taste for projects like Popol Vuh, Klaus Schulze, Lycia and Paul Chain (to name a few), we present hereby our next coming release: 
T H A C L T H I "...Erat Ante Oculos"

A band with no names, no faces and no past.

They came "in silence" (as their name means, from the Liber Linteus Zagrabiensis, in Etruscan language) and in a distressing silence they leave us after 53 minutes of hallucinating sonic violence.

Out 13.11.13

name: Grim Funeral "Abdication Under Funeral Dirge" CD
description:
available now!

Act I Darkness Overture:
I.I Resignation.
I.II Grim Funeral Elegy into Twilight of Humanity.
Act II Life Clausure:
II.I Human Funeral Throne
II.II Crypt Reign
Act III Liveration:
III.I Abdication Under Funeral Dirge.

name: Aphonic Threnody 'first funeral' cd
description: APHONIC THRENODY is a new Anglo-Italian funeral doom project born of the hands of musicians permanently or previously involved in bands like URNA, PANTHEIST, GALLOW GOD, LEECHER, and as sessions in the hyped collective CRIPPLED BLACK PHOENIX. Their doom metal is a rather classic slow paced musical procession in the vein of Esoteric or Evoken , just to name a few concrete examples. Avantgarde Music will release their debut "First Funeral" with a ghost bonus track....

name: Nocturnal Depression "L'Isolement" T-Shirt only
description: 2 sides printed

name: Abigor "Supreme and Immortal is the Art of the Devil" 7" ep
description:
7" in gatefold cover, hand numbered! 300 copies only made
This option does *not* include the CD


-- Ships immediately: in stock now.

Originally Supreme And Immortal was intended to mark Abigor´s 20th year of coating the earthly soil with Satanic Black Metal, yet facing the many disgusting ´anniversary´ releases and concerts, we prefer to just take it for what it is, an old original rough 1997 Abigor recording, where Silenius has breathed (or should we say roared) new life and sense into the reworked lyrics of the original hymns.
we are pround of our roots that reach back to the ancient days of Black Metal, and carry the torch, set ablaze by the black flame in 1993, further with Leytmotif Lucifer soon.

name: Lustre "A Spark of Times of Old" MCD
description:
out on ATMF records

(this is not an Avantgarde Music release)

“A Spark of Times of Old” moves away from the minimalism of “Wonder” and captures a magnificently melancholic and despairing scene.

name: Urna "Mors Principium Est" cd
description:
on ATMF records

(this is not an Avantgarde Music release)

Urna at its very best: fusing the spacious, existential rage of funeral doom progenitors Thergothon and Skepticism with the stately, keen melodic sense of early Anathema and Katatonia. That collision is then wrapped in a futuristic bundle and kicked straight into some nearby disturbance in the space-time continuum. -

name: Abigor "Supreme and Immortal is the Art of the Devil" 7"+CD+T SHIRT
description:
This is the bunde set with grey Tshirt "Supreme And Immortal" (front & back print, logo on sleeve!)

"Supreme And Immortal..." limited and numbered gatefold 7”
featuring Soil Of Souls and Supreme And Immortal
(from an unmixed 1997 tape, new vocals by Silenius)

We have 200 copies that will come with an extra bonus CD featuring Silenius´ first rehearsal May 1994 (it's 5 songs more than on the ep!!)


Originally Supreme And Immortal was intended to mark Abigor´s 20th year of coating the earthly soil with Satanic Black Metal, yet facing the many disgusting ´anniversary´ releases and concerts, we prefer to just take it for what it is, an old original rough 1997 Abigor recording, where Silenius has breathed (or should we say roared) new life and sense into the reworked lyrics of the original hymns.
we are pround of our roots that reach back to the ancient days of Black Metal, and carry the torch, set ablaze by the black flame in 1993, further with Leytmotif Lucifer soon.

name: Abigor "Supreme and Immortal is the Art of the Devil" 7"+CD
description:
"Supreme And Immortal..." limited and numbered gatefold 7”
featuring Soil Of Souls and Supreme And Immortal
(from an unmixed 1997 tape, new vocals by Silenius)

200 copies will include a CD featuring Silenius´ first rehearsal May 1994 (5 songs)

---- Ships immediately. In stock

name: Echoes of Yul 'Cold Ground' CD Digipack
description:
A stylish 6 panels digipack to sweeten the hallucinating performance of this Polish band, one of the best European acts in terms of experimental post doom..........
A traumatic voyage by all means.....


Shipping 15.01.2013

name: Laburinthos 'Augoeides' CD digisleeve
description:
Romania’s best kept secret? Maybe, surely indeed after the success of Negura Bunget and all their branches-born projects we know we can expect something very original, dark, moody every time that we are approaching a Romanian band. 

Laburinthos is no exception to the rule! Their theatrical, at times bizarre and retrò-progressive rock and darkwave, drenched with a sad and elegant mood, is a magic surprise growing on you every further minute of this album: every song is a different chapter of this unexpected yet enthusiastic voyage!

It is on sale at a "launch nice-price" to favour the spreading of this astonishing debut. 
All genuine music fans with a Special soul must become familiar with them and discover the beauty of this album

Shipping 15.01.2013

name: Shining - MonumentuM split 7"
description: Shining’s bleak vision of an old Bay Laurel song ("Pale Colors") and MonumentuM interpretation of PJ Harvey's dusky classic "The River" join here magically...

name: Situs Magus 'Le grand oeuvre' CD standard
description:
This shall be remembered as one of the best debut BM albums of the latest/current years...
Can you handle a funereal combination of Darkspace, Blut Aus Nord and some Deathspell Omega?

Standard edition CD

name: Manii 'Kollaps' CD standard
description:
The return of Manes to their early slow, maniacal black metal roots.. as "Manii"... the new unearthly creation of Cernunnus and Sargatanas.

CD standard jewelcase

name: Before the Rain 'Frail' CD and 7" w/ Shape of Despair
description:
Before the Rain second album confirms their exordium excellence while adding new fresh elements to their elegant romantic doom metal. A must for fans of Paradise Lost, Katatonia, Morgion and such

Please note store's option: you can buy here the CD, the split 7" ep with Shape of Despair or both together in bundle.
Just pay attention at check out options
